title: Scarab
description:
Scarab Stamp, steatite, Egyptian, XVIII Dynasty cat. card dims H. 1/2\' ; The glaze has partially worn off; device a standing figure of the King facing right; a sign of life is in his lowered right hand; each side of the King\'s figure is a vertically placed cartouche continuing the name \'Men-kheper-re\' = Thutmose III.
Signet scarab; standing figure of Thutmose III; cartouche on either side bearding his name; steatite with green glaze.
